Title: Tanay Mehendale | Personal Webpage
Name: Tanay Mehendale
Description: Pursuing Electronics & Telecommunications from Sardar Patel Institute of Technology
Passionate about Data Science & Machine Learning. Although I like to explore various fields :)
AboutContent: I am a billionaire industrialist and inventor. Former CEO of Stark Industries, a conglomerate originally started by my father, Howard Stark.
I am still human, with the exception of an Arc Reactor in my chest.
In order to stop Thanos once and for all, I sacrificed myself to use the Infinity Stones to disintegrate the Mad Titan and his army
CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
